about-dialog.license-text-license: GNU Affero General Public License, Version 3
about-dialog.issues-text: If something does not work or you have a suggestion for improvement, please report on the {{tracker}}.
about-dialog.help-text: If you have a question, please have a look at the {{documentation}}, raise a question in the {{discussions}} or ask in the {{chat}}.
about-dialog.map-data-geoip-description: This product includes GeoLite2 data created by MaxMind, available from {{maxmind}}.

add.hidden-markers-added-message_one: The marker has been added successfully, but the active filter is preventing it from being shown.
add.hidden-markers-added-message_other: {{count}} markers have been added successfully, but the active filter is preventing them from being shown.
add.hidden-lines-added-message_one: The line has been added successfully, but the active filter is preventing it from being shown.
add.hidden-lines-added-message_other: {{count}} lines have been added successfully, but the active filter is preventing them from being shown.
add.hidden-objects-added-message: {{count}} objects have been added successfully, but the active filter is preventing them from being shown.
add.hidden-objects-added-message-some: {{count}} objects have been added successfully, but the active filter is preventing some of them from being shown.

client-provider.disconnected: The connection to the server was lost. Trying to reconnect…

colour-picker.format-error: Needs to be in 6-digit hex format, for example 0000ff.

coordinates.copied-message: The coordinates were copied to the clipboard.

copy-to-clipboard-input.copied-fallback-message: The link was copied to the clipboard.

draw.add-marker-message: Please click on the map to add a marker.
draw.move-marker-message: Drag the marker to reposition it.
draw.add-line-message: Click on the map multiple times to draw a line. Then click “Finish” to save it.

edit-filter-dialog.title: Filter
edit-filter-dialog.introduction: Here you can set an advanced expression to show/hide certain markers/lines based on their attributes. The filter expression only applies to your view of the map, but it can be persisted as part of a saved view or a shared link.
edit-filter-dialog.data-description-2: For checkbox fields, the value is {{uncheckedValue}} (unchecked) or {{checkedValue}} (checked).

edit-type-dialog.delete-field-message: Do you really want to delete the field “{{fieldName}}”?
edit-type-dialog.field-disappeared-error: The field cannot be found on the type anymore.
edit-type-dialog.unique-field-name-error: Multiple fields cannot have the same name.
edit-type-dialog.title: Edit Type
edit-type-dialog.name: Name
edit-type-dialog.styles-introduction: These styles are applied when a new object of this type is created. If “Fixed” is enabled, the style is applied to all objects of this type and cannot be changed for an individual object anymore. For more complex style control, dropdown or checkbox fields can be configured below to change the style based on their selected value.
edit-type-dialog.show-in-legend-description: An item for this type will be shown in the legend. Any fixed style attributes are applied to it. Dropdown or checkbox fields that control the style generate additional legend items.

edit-type-dropdown-dialog.delete-option-message: Do you really want to delete the option “{{value}}”?
edit-type-dropdown-dialog.unique-value-error: Multiple options cannot have the same label.
edit-type-dropdown-dialog.no-options-error: Controlling fields need to have at least one option.
edit-type-dropdown-dialog.label: Label (for legend)

export-dialog.route-type-track-zip: Track points, one file per line (ZIP file)
export-dialog.export-copied-message: The {{format}} export was copied to the clipboard.
export-dialog.title: Export collaborative map
export-dialog.introduction: Export your map here to transfer it to another application, another device or another collaborative map.
export-dialog.gpx-explanation: {{gpx}} files can be used to transfer your map data into navigation and route planning software and devices, such as OsmAnd or Garmin. They contain your markers and lines with their names and descriptions, but not their style attributes (with the exception of some basic attributes supported by OsmAnd).
export-dialog.geojson-explanation: {{geojson}} files can be used to create complete backups or copies of your map. They contain the complete data of your map, including the map settings, views, types, markers and lines along with all their data attributes. To restore a GeoJSON backup or to create a copy of your map, simply import the file into FacilMap again.
export-dialog.html-explanation: {{html}} files can be opened by any web browser. Exporting a map to HTML will render a table with only the data attributes of all markers and lines. This table can also be copy&pasted into a spreadsheet application for further processing.
export-dialog.csv-explanation: {{csv}} files can be imported into most spreadsheet applications and only contain the data attributes of the objects of one type of marker or line.
export-dialog.track-explanation: {{track}} will export your lines exactly as they are on your map.
export-dialog.track-zip-explanation: {{trackZip}} will create a ZIP file with one GPX file for all markers and one GPX file for each line. This works better with apps such as OsmAnd that only support one line style per file.
export-dialog.track-zip-explanation-interpolation-trac: Track points, one file per line (ZIP file)
export-dialog.route-explanation: {{route}} will export only the from/via/to route points of your lines, and your navigation software/device will have to calculate the route using its own map data and algorithm.
export-dialog.apply-filter-label: Only include objects visible under current filter

export-dropdown.gpx-track-tooltip: GPX files can be opened with most navigation software. In track mode, the calculated route is saved in the file.
export-dropdown.gpx-route-tooltip: GPX files can be opened with most navigation software. In route mode, only the start/end/via points are saved in the file, and the navigation software needs to calculate the route.

file-results.add-view-tooltip: Add this view to the map
file-results.add-type-tooltip: Add this type to the map

history-dialog.title: History
history-dialog.introduction: Here you can inspect and revert the last 50 changes to the map.

leaflet-map.attribution-notice: This app is based on map data from [OpenStreetMap](https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright). Find out more in the “[About {{appName}}](#about-dialog)” dialog in the Help menu.

leaflet-map-components.pois-too-many-results: Not all POIs are shown because there are too many results. Zoom in to show all results.

legend-content.click-explanation: Click to show/hide objects of this type.

line-info.move-line-message: Use the routing form or drag the line around to change it. Click “Finish” to save the changes.

manage-bookmarks-dialog.title: Manage Bookmarks
manage-bookmarks-dialog.introduction: Bookmarks are a quick way to remember and access collaborative maps. They are saved in your browser, other users will not be able to see them.

open-map-dialog.map-id-format-error: Please enter a valid map ID or URL.
open-map-dialog.map-not-found-error: No map with this ID could be found.
open-map-dialog.title: Open collaborative map
open-map-dialog.introduction: Enter the link or ID of an existing collaborative map here to open that map.
open-map-dialog.name: Name

overpass-form.custom-explanation-1: Enter an {{statement}} here. Settings and an {{out}} statement are added automatically in the background. For ways and relations, a marker will be shown at the geometric centre, no lines or polygons are drawn.
overpass-form.custom-explanation-2: Example queries are {{parking}} to get parking places or {{atm}} for ATMs.

map-id-edit.unique-id-error: The same link cannot be used for different access levels.

map-settings-dialog.delete-map-message: Are you sure you want to delete the map “{{name}}”? Deleted maps cannot be restored!
map-settings-dialog.admin-link-description: When opening the map through this link, all parts of the map can be edited, including the map settings, object types and views.
map-settings-dialog.write-link-description: When opening the map through this link, markers and lines can be added, changed and deleted, but the map settings, object types and views cannot be modified.
map-settings-dialog.read-link-description: When opening the map through this link, markers, lines and views can be seen, but nothing can be changed.
map-settings-dialog.search-engines-description: If this is enabled, search engines like Google will be allowed to add the read-only version of this map.
map-settings-dialog.map-description-description: This description will be shown under the result in search engines.
map-settings-dialog.cluster-markers-description: If enabled, when there are many markers in one area, they will be replaced by a placeholder at low zoom levels. This improves performance on maps with many markers.
map-settings-dialog.legend-text-description: Text that will be shown above and below the legend. Can be formatted with {{markdown}}.
map-settings-dialog.delete-description: To delete this map, type {{code}} into the field and click the “Delete map” button.

share-dialog.title: Share
share-dialog.include-view: Include current map view (centre: {{centre}}; zoom level: {{zoom}}; layer(s): {{layers}}{{conditionalPois}}{{conditionalSelection}}{{conditionalFilter}})
share-dialog.link-copied-message: The map link was copied to the clipboard.
share-dialog.embed-copied-message: The code to embed {{appName}} was copied to the clipboard.
share-dialog.embed-explanation: Add this HTML code to a web page to embed {{appName}}. {{learnMore}}

user-preferences-dialog.title: User preferences
user-preferences-dialog.introduction: These settings are stored on your computer as a cookie and are applied independently of the opened map.
user-preferences-dialog.language-description: Some translations may not be complete yet. Translations are created by the community, feel free to contribute on {{weblate}}.

route-form.some-destinations-not-found: Some destinations could not be found.

search-box.resize-tooltip: Drag to resize, click to reset
